link.script: window.setTimeout(function () { document.title = "Home - Coosa County School District"; }, 500);

div.div: Coosa County Schools will be closed beginning Monday March 16, 2020
Coosa County Schools are scheduled to re-open Monday April 6, 2020

img.alt: Coosa County Board of Education Building

div.div:
Change will come with the 2018 – 2019 and with change comes the unknown, but we have been as proactive as possible with planning for this new adventure. As always, if you are an administrator, teacher, parent, student or community member, you play a special role in the success of not only our schools but our school system. The size of a school or system does not define what you can do. We may be a small system but there is as much potential in the students of Coosa County as there are in any other school system around. Take your role and “play” it to the best of your ability. As Judy Garland said, “Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else.”
- Andi Ficquette Wilson

br.p: The 2020 Centroid is now on sale and can be purchased for $60. See Mrs. Stover or a yearbook staff member for more information.
Spring Break will be March 23rd-27th. There will be early dismissal on Friday, March 20th.

div.div: 73 Nixburg Road | Rockford, AL 35136 | Ph: 256-377-4913 | Fx: 256-377-2385
